str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of the base of semaino; an indication, especially ceremonially or supernaturally.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: This; he, she, it. Nominative or accusative case neuter plural of houtos; these things.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Name, character, fame, reputation. From a presumed derivative of the base of ginosko; a 'name'.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To throw (cast, put) out; I banish; I bring forth, produce. From ek and ballo; to eject.
An evil-spirit, demon; a heathen deity. Neuter of a derivative of daimon; a d?Monic being; by extension a deity.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
Fresh, new, unused, novel. Of uncertain affinity; new
The tongue; by implication, a language.
